subject: Plus X small spring in throttle pedal
description_text:
Hi there

I noticed a small, loose spring inside of the throttle pedal. I am not sure
where it is supposed to go. Can you please show where it is attached?



Regards
Chanho

conversations.body_text: Hi Chanho,    Have all the screws been loosened? Please refer to the clutch pedal as a reference — you need to compress the spring before it can be properly installed.      Please also take a photo of this area so I can check whether there’s any damage.

Hello

I was adjusting the pedal travel with the blue rubber bump stop when I
noticed there was a spring loose inside of the throttle body.

I have taken off the mounting brackets on the side. I have not taken out
any other screws. I would prefer to not disassemble the entire pedal if it
is not necessary.

I only have the brake and throttle, so I do not have a clutch pedal to
compare.

Can you show me where the spring should attach to?

One of the washers used on the front of the pedal is misshapen, and I can
see it has scratched the inside of the pedal body.

Hi Chanho,    This was our oversight. You can use a screwdriver to scrape it off. We will also inform our production team to screen out defective spacers in advance and strengthen quality control.  By the way, have you finished installing the spring?

The spacer is a minor issue.

I cannot see where the spring should attach, are you able to show me this
please?
Hi Chanho,    Has this part broken?

I cannot feel anything loose after removing the spring, however there
appears to be a crack.

Hi Chanho,    It has indeed cracked. We can send you a replacement throttle pedal. However, if it’s just the broken part that needs to be replaced, we’re not sure if it would be convenient for you to install it yourself.

I would appreciate whatever can be done the fastest. I am still unclear on
how the spring should attach, I can see that there is a small screw but
nothing for the spring.

My original order was 8201038097223122 through AliExpress

Hi Chanho,  We will send you a replacement throttle pedal on Monday and reserve a tracking number for you. We’ll notify you as soon as it’s available.  By the way, did the throttle spring come off while you were playing a game? Did it break when the throttle was fully pressed or fully released?

I have not used the throttle to game yet, I am still awaiting on the
arrival of my cockpit.

I plugged it in to confirm that the pedals were working with the Simsonn
software, but have not given it much use.

I did not know that it had broken, however I could hear some rattling and
noticed the loose spring.

Hi Chanho,  We have already sent you a new accelerator and some parts for repairing damaged pedals. We will update the tracking number to you in about two days as international shipping requires forwarding once. polish

Hi there

I am still yet to receive tracking, could you update me please? Many thanks
Hi Chanho, This is the new throttle and replacement part we are sending you.      EMS：EB842018239CN
